Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Veal \Veal\ (v[=e]l), n.[OE. veel, OF. veel, F. veau, L. vitellus, dim. of vitulus a calf; akin to E. wether. See {Wether}, and cf. {Vellum}, {Vituline}.] The flesh of a calf when killed and used for food. [1913 Webster]
veal n : meat from a calf [syn: {veau}]
